subject: Re: [junit] Re: TDD Using NetBeans 6.5+ and JUnit.
msgSnippet: On Wed, Apr 29, 2009 at 7:47 AM, marcelo_javier_ruiz ... Thanks!  That s all I wanted to confirm.  I was a little confused after your first message. David Saff
messageBody:
On Wed, Apr 29, 2009 at 7:47 AM, marcelo_javier_ruiz
<marcelo_javier_ruiz@...> wrote:
> David,
>
> I'm sorry, but I don't fully understand your message (English is not my mother tongue language). My first impression is that there is nothing preventing NetBeans from running any test, so you don't need the IDE to create the tests for you.

Thanks! That's all I wanted to confirm. I was a little confused
after your first message.

David Saff
